301.title: Moved Permanently
301.message: The page you requested has been permanently moved to a different URL. Please try again with the new URL.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: Please reload the page and check for a working internet connection.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You are not allowed to access this page.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You are not allowed to access this page.

404.title: While we are busy building the earth, we have not yet built this page.
404.message: We can't find the page you're looking for. Please check the URL and try again.

405.title: Method Not Allowed
405.message: The method used to access this page is not allowed. Please try again with a GET method.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The page you are looking for is taking too long to load. Please try again later.

418.title: ðŸ«–
418.message: Please get comfortable with the tea and try again.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You are trying to access this page too often. Please try again later.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: We're having some issues with our server, please try again later.

501.title: Not Implemented
501.message: Your browser does not support features our website requires. Please update your browser.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.message: Our servers are overloaded at the given time, please try again later.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: Our servers are overloaded at the given time, please try again later.

508.title: Loop Detected
508.message: We detected a loop. Please try again later.
